intent: Design a beginner strength training program with limited equipment

success_criteria.primary: Program is safe and achievable for a beginner
success_criteria.secondary: Only uses available equipment (dumbbells, pull-up bar)

must_include: Specific exercises with sets and reps
safety_requirements: Form cues or warnings for complex movements

quality_rubric.safety: No advanced movements inappropriate for beginners
quality_rubric.balance: Works all major muscle groups, not just 'bro splits'
quality_rubric.progressive_overload: Clear path to increase difficulty over time
quality_rubric.specificity: Addresses strength/muscle goal, not cardio or flexibility
